overview: Apartment hunting with a twist: In this over-sexed dream apartment all thoughts circle around one theme: fucking. Instead of working, the painters spray each other sticky. The open house turns into a jack-off orgy. And while the sexy real estate agent checks out the applicants, his insatiable lover goes after the delivery boy and the head painter's dong. 10 ultra-horny actor screwed around with each for the nine man shoot, 5 days long. In this story about a real estate agent who continuously has sex in his rental apartments. Some brand new faces and bodies in front of the camera for the very first time.
title: 160m² Sex
